title: The Vampire Strikes Back
description: The Class of 2013 graduated with the promise of new chapters opening in their lives. Klaus decided to allow Tyler to return to Mystic Falls as a graduation gift to Caroline. Rebekah promised to show Matt how to truly live by taking him on a trip around the world. Stefan started to move on.Seemingly they were all set for a wonderful summer and a new start.Unfortunately in Mystic Falls, as Shakespeare wrote, “….the course of true love never did run smooth.” So now as the summer begins, all their plans shatter.Something epic changes everything.It brings Klaus and Stefan back to Mystic Falls, drives Caroline and Tyler to extremes, and drags Elena and Damon into the middle of it.Most of all, what it means for Rebekah and Matt turns both their worlds in directions they never imagined possible. It may turn out to be the best or the worst summer. And for Klaus there may be a new hope.
author: Alexia Wells
